sentence.Network_en: Gneiss, a metamorphic rock, can be commonly found in Precambrian areas.

sentence.Network_en: The types of mineralized rocks are fine grained biotite gneiss and silicalites.

means.word_mean: 1. a laminated metamorphic rock similar to granite
